attributes.action: ensure that disabled people and users of blue badges only use disabled parking spaces, not lazy able bodied people.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many disabled parking spaces are used by people who are able bodied, leaving those people who need those spaces in awkward situations, some times quite a distance from the place they need to be.  There is nothing that places such as shops can do about this, if this is the case what is the point of having blue badges.  These people need those spaces something needs to be done to make sure that they are using them and not the lazy able people.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
